type.name: org.gradle.BuildResult
type.description: A BuildResult packages up the results of a build executed by a org.gradle.initialization.GradleLauncher instance.

method.name: getAction
method.description: The action performed by this build. Either `Build` or `Configure`.

method.name: rethrowFailure
method.description: Rethrows the build failure. Does nothing if there was no build failure.

property.name: action
property.description: The action performed by this build. Either `Build` or `Configure`.
